entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Altona
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:46 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain mixed with snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:47 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:47 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:47 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
